name: SUPERHAIR
description: SUPERHAIR The Story Planet Hairtooine is under attack by the vile mutant Empire You are our only hope of obliterating this threat Once again our  Hairy friend must save the day in this fast paced side-scrolling shoot-em-up Blast your way to success and be the Hero you was born to be Good Luck, SuperHair! CONTROLS KEYBOARD   O - LEFT    P - RIGHT  Q - UP     A - DOWN  SPACE or M to FIRE LAZERS JOYSTICK SINCLAIR Credits An Original Game, Coding, Design & Graphics by  Lee Chops Stevenson AY Music by Pedro Pimenta Rich Hollins Beeper Music and additional Code Loading Screens LOBO Story screen by Andy Green This Game is Free If you would like to, could you please donate a small drink too.. https://www.justgiving.com/southendcysticfibrosisassociation Many, many thanks  :D THE PHYSICAL GAME / TAPE CAN BE PURCHASED HERE : https://www.bitmapsoft.co.uk/product/super-hair/ Proceeds got to charity
